item.name: McLaren Vale III Associates
item.description: McLaren Vale III Associates is a very successful boutique winery. Its signature wine is Squid Ink Shiraz. Mary Greer, Managing Director, Reg Wymond, Director and Brian Light,Winemaker have over 80 years combined experience in the wine industry. An impressive portfolio of estate-grown wines allows them control over quality and consistency, thus enjoying success in Australian and International wine shows (in 2011 they won 10 gold medals and a trophy). Exports to the US, Canada, Indonesia, Hong Kong, Singapore and China.
